name: chubby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of children) fat in a pleasant and attractive way: chubby legs chubby cheeks

Add to word list
(esp. of children) rounded in a pleasant and attractive way: The perfect baby has, we are told, chubby little fingers and toes, chubby legs, and chubby cheeks.
